title: Welcome
cleaned_text: best in Chiropractic, Massage, and Acupuncture for Grand Rapids and the Surrounding areas. Natural Choice Chiropractic offers the best in chiropractic, massage and acupuncture. Since 2002 we have been delivering exceptional care to people of all ages and walks of life. Our care is safe, gentle and affordable focusing on removing interferences from the body to allow healing and to restore proper function and performance. From the moment you walk in you'll be greeted with smiling faces. The soothing sounds, refreshing smell, curved walls, bamboo floors, trickling fountain and natural art create a comfortable setting that will help you to distress and relax the mind and body. Our providers and therapists are board certified, licensed and compassionate individuals looking to help you achieve the best results in the shortest period of time. With a specific plan of action we have been able to successfully meet the needs and goals of our practice members while taking into consideration each unique medical and physical condition. We invite you to step inside and experience why we are the natural choice for your healthcare needs..... Office Hours: Mon. 8:00 am - 12:30 pm 2:30 pm - 6:30 pm Fri. Hours are 9:00 am - 12:00 pm Mission Statement: The mission of Natural Choice Chiropractic is to provide exceptional care for people of all ages utilizing the latest methods in a state of the art facility. Our team is committed to serving, educating and empowering our members to implement a wellness lifestyle for the expansion of human potential globally. Our Purpose: We all perform better when we are happy, healthy and motivated. Unfortunately, today's lifestyles don't always foster healthy habits and the health of our country is declining as a result. Our Chiropractic Outreach Program can help. We offer general health education and awareness programs to business and community organizations of all sizes. Our objective is simple, to educate and promote healthy lifestyle choices. Our plan is to safeguard the heath of our community one person at a time. Best of all, the program is free of charge. Contact us today about sharing our knowledge with your workplace, church or community group. Together we can build a stronger community!
